title: Fifty years on, French protests echo May 1968
text:
Fifty years on, French protests echo May 1968 10:17am EDT - 01:59
When millions of workers and student demonstrators brought French society to its knees in 1968 it was a revolution for their politics, culture, and economy. Now, as the country marks the event's 50th anniversary, modern day activists see parallels in 2018's crises. Richard Lough reports.
